item.title: AGNC
item.description: score:1035 Chances: AGNC Investment (AGNC) may be worthy of consideration as the worst effects of interest rate hikes appear to be over. AGNC Investment’s commitment to repositioning its portfolio in the current interest rate scenario may optimize performance. Dividend-focused investors may find AGNC Investment appealing due to its high yield and potential income.
